content: भूरि {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [भू-क्रिन् <ls>Uṇ. 4. 65.</ls>] {@--1@} Much, abundant, numerous, copious. {@--2@} Great, large. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} An epithet of Viṣṇu. {@--2@} Of Brahman. {@--3@} Of Śiva. {@--4@} Of Indra. {%--<ab>n.</ab>%} Gold. {%--<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Very much, exceedingly,; नवांबुभिर्भूरि विलंबिनो घनाः <ls>Ś. 5. 12.</ls> {@--2@} Frequently, often, repeatedly.
